org.alljoyn.bus
Class ErrorReplyBusException

Object
  Throwable
      Exception
          BusException
              ErrorReplyBusException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ErrorReplyBusException
extends BusException

AllJoyn ERROR message exceptions. AllJoyn ERROR messages are sent as replies to method calls to signal that an exceptional failure has occurred.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
ErrorReplyBusException(String name, String message)
          Constructs an ErrorReplyBusException with an error name and message from an error reply message.
 
Method Summary
 String getErrorMessage()
          Gets the (optional) error message.
 String getErrorName()
          Gets the error name.

Constructor Detail

ErrorReplyBusException
